title: Recoil
description: India's first reverse looping roller coaster that gives you the ultimate adrenaline rush!

title: Insanity
description: A giant pendulum ride that swings you 360 degrees at a height of 65 feet!

title: Hurricane
description: A thrilling funnel-shaped water slide that gives you a whirlpool experience!

title: Uphill Racers
description: Race your friends uphill on these exciting water slides!

title: Toy Train
description: A fun train ride for kids that takes them around the park!
